headline: AppLovin (APP) Posts $1.66B Revenue in Q4, Analysts Highlight Robust Growth in Both Advertising and Apps Segments
summary: AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) ranks among the best stocks to buy now for long-term growth. Following AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP)’s fourth-quarter 2025 financial results, Benchmark reaffirmed its Buy rating and $775 price target for the stock on February 12. AppLovin’s revenue during the quarter totaled $1,658 million, exhibiting a 66% year-over-year growth plus 18% concurrent growth, beating […]
